room_title: Escape room "Mad Tea Party" by Zero Hour Escape Rooms in Minneapolis - St. Paul
review: Oh my gosh, me and three 15-year-olds did The Mad Tea room tonight and it was the best puzzle room I have ever done! The puzzles were so clever and Kay helped to make it so fun by giving us hints! I highly recommend this room for people of all ages. It was so much fun! Thank you, we will be back!

room_title: Escape room "Mad Tea Party" by Zero Hour Escape Rooms in Minneapolis - St. Paul
review: Just left! Did the Alice in Wonderland room, so much fun! Will be back for sure!

room_title: Escape room "Mad Tea Party" by Zero Hour Escape Rooms in Minneapolis - St. Paul
review: My husband and I brought our 15 and 17-year-old cousins to do the Mad Tea party room. I would love to go into detail about how great it was, but don't want to give anything away! Great place, so much fun, perfect amount of challenge, and very well planned out with a big variety of puzzles to solve. Would highly recommend!
